examples.example: 在微观世界里，一微米的距离也可能蕴含着巨大的奥秘。

translate.english: In the microscopic world, a distance of one micron may also contain tremendous mysteries.

examples.example: 即使是一微米的进步，也是值得我们骄傲和庆祝的。

translate.english: Even a micrometer of progress is also worthy of our pride and celebration.

examples.example: 每一次努力哪怕只有一微米的成果，那也是靠近梦想的一步。

translate.english: Every effort, even if there is only a micron of achievement, that is also a step closer to the dream.
